name: Sheet Pan Coq au Vin
description: Say “au revoir” to complicated cooking and “bonjour” to an irresistibly easy, elevated weeknight dinner. We’ve taken this iconic, French dish, known for bold flavours and tedious prep, and turned it into a hassle-free sheet pan meal. And we’ve swapped traditional red wine for a lighter white, but feel free to use Nourish or Vegetable Broth instead.

ingredients.name: unsalted white beans
ingredients.additionalInstruction: such as white kidney beans, drained and rinsed

preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
In a large bowl, add beans, mushrooms, oil, chicken, and seasoning. Toss until well coated.
Arrange on pan. Drizzle with wine. Roast 30 min, or until chicken is cooked through.
tips: Use your favourite type of white bean, or try something new! White kidney beans hold their shape better once cooked; butter beans (a.k.a. baby lima beans) are uber creamy; and Great Northern beans are mild but absorb lots of flavour.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup cooked grains or mashed potatoes and 1 cup steamed veggies.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
